texts.name: Sniff
texts.biography: 'Sniff' seems like a mocking nickname, but he's really proud of his sense of smell. That's also the reason why foes who try to track him often find themselves waylaid instead.

specialty.name: Wererat
specialty.description: Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Wererat or Wererat Rager for each level attained after 1st level.
